wikipedia_page.main: Alex Lozowski (born 30 June 1993) is an English professional rugby union footballer playing in the Gallagher Premiership for Saracens. He was named in Eddie Jones's 2017 Six Nations  England  squad and made his England debut in June 2017 against Argentina.

response: Former students in sport include triathletes Alistair Brownlee and Jonathan Brownlee, ocean rower and former UK MP Dan Byles, as well as England rugby union players Tom Palmer and Alex Lozowski.
